jmf.core

Class ModuleEventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmf.core.ModuleEventDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerDiscoveryCore, IMessagingCore, ISubscriptionHandler

    public class ModuleEventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubscriptionHandler, IMessagingCore, IPeerDiscoveryCore
    Event dispatching class receiving ZMQ messages (events, requests) and PeerStateChanges. The events are queued in a Poco notification queue and are delivered by one processing thread. This guarantees singlethreaded calls to module implementations
    Author:
    Jonas Grunert, Jan Strau√ü, Tobias Korb created on 7/13/15.
